participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, loves to explore and have fun with friends.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Patient and nurturing, enjoys spending quality time with family and is a big fan of storytelling.
participant_2.background: i'm a stay at home dad. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites.
